SECTION_CONTENT:
Flammable solid. Dangerous fire risk.
Reacts violently with water. When heated to decomposition, may emit toxic fumes.
In case of fire: Use a Class D, Met-L-X, or dry sand as a fire extinguisher. Avoid water contact, violent reaction
with water.
